body.p:
Floyd Circuit Court
The Commonwealth of Kentucky
against } Indictment
R. Robbertson

The Grand Jury of Floyd County in the name and by the authority of the Commonwealth of Kentucky accuse R. Robertson of the offence of Arson Committed as follows To wit the Said R. Robertson on the 1st day of January 1863 in the County and Circuit aforesaid did willfully & feloniously set fire to the dwelling House of Elias Bradley with a view for the purpose Injuring the said Bradley and destroying his said House.
Against the peace and dignity of the Commonwealth of Kentucky

J S Dury Commonwealth Attorney
A Copy Attest
John G Johns C. F. C. C
